Notes

Patti Smith, Michael Brecker and Randy Brecker appear courtesy of Arista Records. 1st Pressing (1976): gatefold jacket no barcode 2nd Pressing (198?): barcode on cover Runouts are etched except 'F, 1 B' are stamped. 'Joe' is in script.
